content.text:
# Draft:List of SRC Presidents of the University of Witwatersrand

The  Students Representative Council (SRC) of the University of the Witwatersrand (Wits) is a statutory governance structure established under the Higher Education Act of South Africa. It is elected annually by the student body and consists of 18 members who either represent student organisations or stand as independents.has had a number of presidents since its establishment. The list of SRC Presidents below is based from the official [https://www.wits.ac.za/alumni/history-and-traditions/src-and-bss-presidents/ Wits University Alumni SRC Presidents page]. and shows the SRC Presidents by year.
